name: Google Ultimate [Deprecated]
description:
Style is abandoned, a new style is being developed and will be available late in 2020, a new improved version of this Apply this theme to add a background image to google homepage, add card like UI for google search and stylish buttons for search, including numerous other tweaks
Theme affects:
  • Homepage new background image with every refresh
  • Homepage buttons with transition effects (NOT WORKING RIGHT NOW)
  • Search Results with card view
  • Links with transition effects
  • Image page with new UI for preview (NOT WORKING RIGHT NOW)
  • Image page with new button style (NOT WORKING RIGHT NOW)

user.name: RÃ©v O'Conner
user.about: Digital artist among other things. Working with CSS since 2009.

additional_info:
This is my primary userstyle so I will be pushing changes regularly.

Changelog: 29th Feb 2020: Style abandoned. New CSS is in work, improving on this style but trying to be compatible with all google services, also with a dark mode. Work is underway and will be available sometime in the future. Feel free to make this your own and keep developing this if you want. No attribution required. 27th August 2019: Home Page Button is now not black, needs to be edited. The links are now blue and not pink. 20th March 2017: Made the image search functional again. 18th March 2017: Set an option to choose from the background image refresh rate. You can either have picture of the day or new image on every refresh. 17th March 2017: Removed the white google logo because it was causing problems in the google.COM domain. Image-set option isnt working in CSS. Will have to find a way using rgexp

discussions.name: Post bugs here, if you find any
